articles.title: Trump Urges Netanyahu to End Gaza Conflict Hastily

articles.author: Lifehacker
articles.title: Elon Musk's AI Image Generator Is a Deepfaker's Dream
articles.description: X, formerly Twitter, just gave premium users access to Grok 2.0, an image generator that seems to have almost no filters. The chatbot has been used to depict Kamala Harris and Donald Trump doing drugs, branding guns, and committing acts of terrorism.
articles.content:
Credit: Grok 2.0
